Our Working Process

Firstly, our designers create the concept of a template, which can be changed and modified. Then our developers begin to work on implementing the template’s final look and features. Finally, our QA experts make sure that everything works perfectly just as you would expect.

About Mirax

Mirax is HTML template that fits for both developers and beginners. It comes loaded with an assortment of tools and features that make customization process much easier. A pack of child themes, specially designed for various business niches, allows users to create a fully functional site for any specific business quickly and worry-free.
